::::

<center>
IUCN status: **Extinct**

Last seen: *Notamacropus greyi were last seen in 1924 in Konetta Station, between Robe and Penola, SA (IUCN 2023)*

IUCN claim: *"The introduced red fox and hunting contributed to the extinction."*

</center>


### Studies in support

Toolache wallabies were last confirmed at Konetta Station 34-44 years after foxes arrived (Current submission).

### Studies not in support

No studies

### Is the threat claim evidence-based?

No studies were found evidencing a link between foxes and the extinction of toolache wallabies.
